home.trustedPartner: Your trusted partner in home building.
home.decadeOfExcellence: A Decade of Excellence in Home Building Across the Greater Vancouver Area
home.introParagraph1: TCSC Construction was founded in 2013 by Ms. Barbara Cheng with a mission to redefine the standards of quality and craftsmanship in the construction industry. Our journey began with a vision to deliver exceptional homes and foster strong, trust-based relationships with our clients.
home.introParagraph2: Through dedication, hard work, and a steadfast commitment to our core values, we have established ourselves as a trusted name in the Greater Vancouver area. Our award-winning team is known for its outstanding workmanship, integrity, and professionalism.
home.introParagraph3: Since our inception, we have completed numerous projects, each reflecting our unwavering commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. At TCSC Construction, we build more than homes; we build dreams.

footer.officeHoursDetails:
Mon -- Fri: 9:00 am -18:00 pm
Sun: closed
footer.workingAreasDetails: Serving the Greater Lower Mainland Vancouver including Richmond, Burnaby, and Port Coquitlam.

aboutUs.slogan: THE QUALITY IS OUR PRIORITY. OUR CORE VALUES. OUR BELIEFS.

values.title: LOCAL BUILDER
values.description: Our experience includes custom home building, project management, and land development throughout the area, including Vancouver, Richmond, Burnaby, and Port Coquitlam.

values.title: HERE TO STAY
values.description: TCSC Construction has established itself as a trusted custom home building company in 2005 and continues to grow and evolve.

values.title: SOLID REPUTATION
values.description: TCSC Construction has built a solid reputation for integrity and exceptional customer service.

values.title: LICENSED AND BONDED BUILDER
values.description: TCSC Construction is a licensed and bonded builder, employing the finest craftsmen.

values.title: WARRANTY
values.description: TCSC Construction offers 2-5-10 National Home Warranty, ensuring peace of mind for our clients.

values.title: REASONABLE PRICES
values.description: We take pride in building high-quality custom homes at reasonable prices.

services.title: Home Build Management
services.description: We offer comprehensive home build management services, ensuring your project is completed on time and within budget.

services.title: Renovation
services.description: Our renovation services are designed to transform your existing space into the home of your dreams.

services.title: Landscaping
services.description: We provide professional landscaping services to enhance the beauty and functionality of your outdoor spaces.
